documents.title: rspca reports rise in animal cruelty claims
text: hampshire has been named as one of the uk 's worst places for complaints of animal cruelty by the rspca .
the charity looked into 149,604 complaints in total compared to 143,004 in 2015 , but the number of successful prosecutions fell more than 6 % to 744 .
the county was one of 10 hotspots for complaints in 2016 with 4,131 .
the rspca said the surge in complaints may be due to increased use of social media .
the charity said it also investigated more than 400 allegations of animal cruelty per day last year - a rise of nearly 5 % compared to the previous 12 months .
we investigated 149,604 # animalabuse complaints in 2016 .

documents.title: breakingthree-week-old baby dies after attempted murder arrests
text: a three-year-old baby has died after two people were arrested on sus of attempted murder .
hampshire constabulary have confirmed that a man and woman in their twenties were arrested after the baby from gosport was admitted to hospital last week .
the baby has now died after suffering a serious injury and specialist officers have been investigating at an address in forton road to determine how the infant was hurt .
the man and woman have been bailed until september .

documents.title: search continues for teenage boy missing for five days
text: police are continuing to search for missing teenager logan austin .
the 15-year-old has been missing from the fareham area since the early hours of saturday 25 march .
it is believed he does not have any money or a phone with him and may be in essex .
hampshire constabulary are appealing for anyone who might have seen him to get in touch .
author: Emily Ford
BBC South

documents.title: suspect sought over andover stabbing
text: a man has been found stabbed in the chest and legs on a pathway in andover prompting a police appeal .
the 30-year-old was found in the st anne 's close and suffolk road area at about 20:00 bst last night .
police said he was taken to hospital where his condition was described as `` serious , but not life threatening '' .
police heave appealed to anyone who saw someone running away or a vehicle leaving the area to contact them .

documents.title: nuclear bomber sailing to portsmouth
text: a french cold war nuclear bomber is reaching the end of its journey to its new home at an english air museum .
the 31-tonne dassault mirage iva has been donated to the yorkshire air museum , at elvington near york , by the french government .
the 77ft-long ( 23m ) plane is travelling 527 miles ( 848km ) and is due to sail from le havre arriving in portsmouth this evening before finishing its journey by road on thursday .
it is the only mirage iv aircraft to be given to an independent museum and the only one outside france .
good morning !

documents.title: school to be run by aspirations academy trust
text: isle of portland academy ipaca is to be run by the aspirations academy trust from september .

catherine shaw , chair of governors at ipaca , said : ipaca needs a partner that can bring the skills and resources the school ca n't provide itself in order to rapidly improve and prevent more children receiving an education that is below expectations . ''
the academy school has recently been rated inadequate by ofsted and seen its principal resign and announced cost cutting could see jobs axed .
the school was placed in special measures by ofsted in january , following an inspection in november .
joss hayes , the school 's principal , walked out at the end of last month .

documents.title: sunbeam anniversary : museum marks record 200mph run
text: 90 years ago today the sunbeam 1000hp broke the 200mph land speed record at daytona beach in florida .
the car , an exhibit at the .
national motor museum .
in beaulieu , is currently having one of its engines restored to make it run for the first time in over half a century .
the museum said it hopes to run the engine later this year .
# otd 1927 the sunbeam 1000hp 'slug ' became the first car to break the 200mph barrier .
priviledged to visit with @ twitterid last week , doug 's talk about the sunbeam engine restoration was fascinating .

documents.title: views sought on upton country park plans
text: the public is being asked for its views on plans to improve upton country park in poole .
it comes following the park 's £ 15m bid to the heritage lottery fund .
they 've now set up an online visitor survey to find out what people would like to see change at the park .
if the bid is successful the park said it planned to focus on three main themes ; people , heritage , and landscapes .

documents.title: caravan built from lego arrives at beaulieu
text: a caravan made from lego has gone on display at beaulieu .
commissioned by the national caravan council , the creation was constructed over 12 weeks using more than 200,000 bricks and weighs about 1,200kg !
new arrival : a record-breaking life-size # lego # caravan !
see it on display in the national motor museum .

text: 'deliberately poisoned ' pine trees die

documents.title: oldest man 'bit irked ' over brexit on his birthday
text: one of britain 's oldest men , bob weighton is celebrating his 109th birthday today .
mr weighton , who lives in alton , said he was a `` bit irked '' that teresa may had chosen his birthday to start brexit .
he said : `` she did n't ring me up to see what my reaction would be . ''
he said he was celebrating by having lunch with his family .
originally from hull he shares the title with alf smith , of perth , scotland , who also turns 109 today .

documents.title: appeal after girl , 10 , struck by car on portland
text: a 10-year-old girl has been taken to hospital after being knocked down by a car on portland .
the child was hit by a nissan car on grove road shortly before 16:00 gmt yesterday .
police said the girl , who was taken to hospital after the crash , suffered serious but not life-threatening or life-changing injuries .
witnesses are being asked to contact police .
witness appeal after road traffic collision on portland

documents.title: mother 'infatuated ' by ex-soldier accused of her murder
text: a woman had a `` volatile relationship '' with her ex-boyfriend who is accused of stabbing her 11 times , her mother has told a court .
after getting together with jay nava , natasha wake became `` quickly infatuated '' , shelley powell told winchester crown court .
the prosecution alleges mr nava fatally stabbed her while her children slept upstairs at her bournemouth home .
ex-soldier mr nava , of royal citadel , plymouth , denies miss wake 's murder .

documents.title: gary stacey death : law student 'killed man with one punch '
text: a law student killed a father-of-10 with one punch while on a night out on the isle of wight , a court has heard .
gary stacey ( 49 , died from brain injuries after being hit in the street in newport in february 2016 .
ryan cooper , 21 , has gone on trial at winchester crown court charged with manslaughter .
he denies the charge .
prosecutors said there was `` no dispute '' that mr cooper had thrown the punch , which he insisted was in self defence .

documents.title: residents 'appalled ' over lost poisoned trees
text: residents in bournemouth say they are `` appalled '' that two of three pine trees on west cliff green have died after they were deliberately poisoned last summer .
the trunks of two pines in the area close to the former st george 's hotel site were drilled up to 15 times last june .
a third pine was damaged the following month and a `` crystal-like '' substance was discovered on its bark .
tests showed .
the substance was the herbicide glyphosate , the borough council said .
